name: Luna's Tale: Curse of the Forgotten Doll
blurb: A new hand painted platformer for PS4, PC/Mac, Xbox One & Wii U from the team who brought you Percy's Predicament, Tekno Trak & more!

rewards.reward: THANK YOU!                                                            \r\n===========================\r\nEvery dollar counts! Join in the discussion by pledging just a buck. You will receive all future updates from this campaign and get a digital wallpaper.

EARLY BIRD PRICE DIGITAL COPY OF LUNA'S TALE\r\n=============================\r\nA code to download the game on the platform of your choice at a lower price and everything above. This is the same as the $10 reward just at a lower price for backing the game early (If we reach our stretch goals for other platforms, we will allow you to pick those platforms). You also will receive a digital wallpaper immediately following the end of the campaign. Your name will also appear in the credits as an early adopter and you will receive access into the beta.

DIGITAL COPY OF LUNA's TALE\r\n=============================\r\nA code to download the game on the platform of your choice. You also will receive a digital wallpaper immediately following the end of the campaign. You will also get an invite to the Beta testing to help the development. Credited as Backer in the end credits of the game

ALL DIGITAL
==============================

For backing us at this tier, you receive a digital copy of the game, the digital soundtrack in either lossless Flac files, MP3 files or Aiff files and the digital art book.

PHYSICAL COPY + PS4/VITA COMBO BREAKER\r\n================================ \r\nFor this tier, we are doing something a little different. You get the physical copy of the game on USB plus you get two more copies. One on PS4 and one on Vita! (Cross play is not guaranteed)

HAND MADE SHOT GLASS\r\n=============================\r\nOne of our artists is a skillful painter of real world objects and will paint Custom Shot Glasses for you! You will also get the ALL DIGITAL tier and access to the beta.

HAND DRAWN CONCEPT ART & ALL DIGITAL\r\n===========================\r\nWe will send you an original hand drawn concept art piece from Luna's Tale as well as the digital art book, soundtrack, and game. You will also get the ALL DIGITAL tier and access to the beta.
PHYSICAL COPY & ALL DIGITAL & ALPHA TEST\r\n===================================\r\nYou will receive a copy of Luna's Tale on a 4GB Flash Drive as well as the ALL DIGITAL TIER
SIGNED POSTER & ALL DIGITAL & ALPHA TEST\r\n============================\r\nIn this tier, you will receive a signed poster and the all digital tier
PHYSICAL ART BOOK & ALL DIGITAL & ALPHA TEST ============================ In this tier, you will receive a physical art book and the all digital tier

TSHIRT & ALPHA TEST & ALL DIGITAL\r\n===========================\r\nFor this amount, we will send you a limited Kickstarter exclusive T-Shirt for Luna's Tale as well as provide you access to an early alpha build to help with development at an earlier stage. You also get the ALL DIGITAL tier.

MAESTRO BUNDLE & ALPHA TEST & ALL DIGITAL\r\n===========================\r\nFor this amount, we will send you codes for our entire game library up till this point as well as this title and two other futures title as well as provide you access to an early alpha build to help with development at an earlier stage. You also get the ALL DIGITAL reward tier.

VINYL & ALL DIGITAL & ALPHA TEST\r\n======================================\r\nFor this tier, we will be giving out a limited edition 12" Vinyl copy of the soundtrack. Due to vinyl's space limitations, we can only put a certain number of songs on the Vinyl so you will get the ALL DIGITAL tier.

ALL PHYSICAL & ALPHA TEST \r\n======================================\r\nThis reward tier allows you to get the following: A physical release of the game for PC/Mac on a 4GB USB Drive,  a physical copy of the soundtrack(CD), a physical art book signed by the team, a poster and the T-Shirt

BAD GUY DESIGNER & ALL PHYSICAL & ALPHA TEST   ===========================\r\nWe will send you a design document to fill out for an in game enemy. We will create your personally designed monster as one you can encounter in the game. We will send out a concept art piece exclusive to your enemy and your character will also be included in the art book. You will be included in the credits under Additional Design. We will also provide you with four additional digital copies, providing you with five total copies. (Including the flash drive copy) You also will get the ALL PHYSICAL TIER.

BOSS DESIGNER & ALL PHYSICAL & ALPHA TEST \r\n============================\r\nWe will send you a design document to fill out for an in game enemy. We will create your personally designed boss you encounter in the game. We will send out a concept art piece exclusive to your boss design and your character will also be included in the art book. You will be included in the credits under Additional Design. We will also provide you with nine additional copies, providing you with ten total copies. You also will get the ALL PHYSICAL TIER.

CONSULTATION & ALL PHYSICAL & ALPHA TEST 
============================
We will provide a consultation with you, perhaps you have a great game idea but need advice? Perhaps you're an aspiring artist and need some help getting in the right direction? Audio designer wanting some help on a reel?
We can help you out. We will host a private session with you for 1 on 1 time for 5 hours. You will also get the ALL PHYSICAL TIER

If you do not live in Austin, we will use Skype and break the consultation up into 1 hour chunks.

CREATOR & ALL PHYSICAL & ALPHA TEST 
============================
Do you have a game idea that you want to see come to fruition? One lucky backer will have the opportunity to see their dream come true. We will host a one on one session with you to discuss your idea and help you flesh it out. Then we will develop it for you. You will also get everything from the $100 tier and below and a limited edition shirt of 1 for the logo for your game on it that we help you develop. You also get the ALL PHYSICAL tier.

Please keep game ideas realistic and feasible as we are a small team.
